_source.short_desc: Powerful statistical software everyone can use to analyze data and find meaningful solutions to their toughest business problems.
_source.long_desc: Minitab Statistical Software is a powerful statistical software everyone can use from anywhere. Visualize, analyze and harness the power of data with Minitab. Our comprehensive and trusted analyses combined with unparalleled ease-of-use make it simple to get deep, accurate insights. From quality and reliability engineering to product development, business and predictive analytics to process validation, Minitab is your partner to help solve your toughest challenges and bring your success to life.
_source.pricing_details:
Minitab offers a free trial for 30 days. Paid plans with single and multiple user licenses. Details include:
Single-User Annual License starting from $1,610
Volume discounts available
_source.target_audience: Our clients are diverse and include all sizes, industries, and geographies. The one thing they share is their commitment to excellence and valuable insights from their data.

category_features.name: Association Discovery
category_features.definition: Machine learning method, based on rules, to find interesting relationships between variables in large databases

category_features.name: Bayesian Analysis
category_features.definition: Procedure, based on an observed distribution, that attempts to estimate parameters of an underlying distribution

category_features.name: Data Visualization
category_features.definition: Graphical representation of the data

category_features.name: Forecasting
category_features.definition: Form predictions based on past and present data/trends

category_features.name: Multivariate Analysis
category_features.definition: Analysis of data sets that contain more than one variable

category_features.name: Regression Analysis
category_features.definition: Analysis to understand which of the independent variables are related to the dependent variable

category_features.name: Statistical Process Control
category_features.definition: Statistical methods to assist with and maintain quality control of processes

category_features.name: Statistical Simulation
category_features.definition: Assess the performance of a method by picking a random sample from a normal distribution

category_features.name: Survival Analysis
category_features.definition: Analyze the expected duration of time until one or more events occur

category_features.name: Time Series Analysis
category_features.definition: Series of data points indexed in time order

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Data Discovery
category_features.definition: AI method of discovering or extracting data patterns from larger volumes of data

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Templates
category_features.definition: Sample files or documents that could be customized as needed or used as is

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.definition: Connect to big data sources

category_features.definition: Discover and connect variety of data sources to the application for analysis

category_features.definition: Graphical representation of the data

category_features.definition: Ability to interact with the application using human languaes such as English

category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.definition: Build query to perform special operations over data set such as data extraction, data union, modification etc.

category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.definition: Access, combine, transform, and store data without the help of an IT department

category_features.definition: Generate reports on your own without IT involvement

category_features.definition: Identify patterns in assembled data

related_products.short_desc: Tableau Software helps people see and understand data. Tableau delivers fast analytics, visualization and business intelligence.
related_products.features: Tableau helps people transform data into actionable insights that make an impact. Easily connect to data stored anywhere, in any format. Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data. Learn More!

related_products.short_desc: Visualize, explore and analyze your data with a user-friendly, point-and-click interface. Optimize your workflow with batch operations.
related_products.features: Origin is an industry-leading graphing and data analysis software for scientists and engineers. Origin is used by 500,000+ registered customers in more than 6,000 companies, 6,500 colleges and universities, and 3,000 government agencies and research labs, worldwide.  Our users rely on Origin to import, plot, explore, analyze, and interpret their data. Origin provides tools for repeat operations such as batch plotting and batch analysis, all without the need to learn any programming language.

related_products.short_desc: Alteryx empowers analysts to answer critical questions in a repeatable way with self-service, end-to-end analytics.
related_products.features: Alteryx is the launchpad for automation breakthroughs. Be it your personal growth, achieving transformative digital outcomes, or rapid innovation, the results are unparalleled. The unique innovation that converges analytics, data science and process automation into one easy-to-use platform, empowers everyone and every organization to make business-altering breakthroughs the new status quo.

related_products.short_desc: Business intelligence software by Salesforce.com. Explore any data, get instant answers, and collaborate with your team.
related_products.features: Now, there's nothing between you and the insights you need. For every business user. Explore any combination of data, get answers instantly, and share with your team. From any device, anywhere, faster than ever before. For analysts. Deliver new insights to your business users however, wherever, and whenever they want them. Uncover every opportunity at the speed of your business.

related_products.short_desc: JMP is the data analysis tool of choice for hundreds of thousands of scientists, engineers and other data explorers worldwide.
related_products.features:
JMP, data analysis software for Mac and Windows, combines the strength of interactive visualization with powerful statistics.  

Importing and processing data is easy. The drag-and-drop interface, dynamically linked graphs, libraries of advanced analytic functionality, scripting language and ways of sharing findings with others, allows users to dig deeply into their data, with greater ease and speed.

related_products.short_desc: A powerful but easy to use Excel Add-In, that will enable you to Measure, analyze, improve, and control your processes.
related_products.features: SigmaXL, was designed from the ground up to be a cost-effective, powerful, but easy to use tool that enables users to measure, analyze, improve and control their service, transactional, and manufacturing processes. As an add-in to the already familiar Microsoft Excel, SigmaXL is ideal for Lean Six Sigma training and application, or use in a college statistics course.

related_products.short_desc: ClientIQ is a Sales Intelligence Platform that equips enterprise sellers with financial data & insights to better understand prospects.
related_products.features:
FinListics Solutions helps enterprise sales organizations harness & leverage the power of Insight-Led Selling to engage prospects with value-driven narratives that create competitive separation, and build trust & credibility at scale.

Our award-winning Sales Intelligence platform, ClientIQ, equips advanced-level sellers with financial data, context, insights, and tools to inform a point of view and demonstrate a deep understanding of a prospect's business performance challenges & opportunities.

related_products.short_desc: Access and utilize a wide range of statistical procedures from summary statistics to design of experiments in an intuitive interface.
related_products.features: Built for businesses across the globe and designed with powerful functionality for the professional user, Statgraphics Centurion 18 enables even non-statisticians to seize the advantages of business analytics. Run statistical analyses, build models and design experiments in an intuitive interface. Read Stat Advisor's text explanations in your results to help understand your findings. Create impressive reports with our stunning data visualization options. Download a free 30 day trial today!

related_products.short_desc: Provide statistics software where students understood their analyses and it was easy to use.
related_products.features: Intuitive statistical software for the non statistician. Users conduct analyses using our wizard-like interface, and the output is an interpreted narrative with assumptions addressed and APA formatted tables and figures. Create print-ready, APA formatted quantitative results in minutes.

related_products.short_desc: Obtain team performance in terms of email activity, collaboration, calendar commitment, customer engagement, browsing habits and more
related_products.features: GAT Labs makes it easy to analyse & manage Google Workspace, Chrome & any web app accessed via your Google account. When combined with Google Cloud Identity, GAT is the ONLY toolset offering such oversight & protection. ActiveID for Chrome provides the 1st zero-trust environment for Google Workspace. Understand who your team communicates with & engagement levels. Measure activity levels in email volume, response times, etc. Identify contact networks for team members, including alias accounts.

similar_products.short_desc: JMP is the data analysis tool of choice for hundreds of thousands of scientists, engineers and other data explorers worldwide.
similar_products.features:
JMP, data analysis software for Mac and Windows, combines the strength of interactive visualization with powerful statistics.  

Importing and processing data is easy. The drag-and-drop interface, dynamically linked graphs, libraries of advanced analytic functionality, scripting language and ways of sharing findings with others, allows users to dig deeply into their data, with greater ease and speed.

similar_products.short_desc: Keen's platform analyzes financial impact across all Marketing channels and models the optimal future investment by channel, by week.
similar_products.features: Keen's innovative Marketing decision platform unifies statistical analysis across marketing's disparate channels (digital, traditional media and even in-store). Keen goes beyond short-term ROIs to calculate each program's total financial contribution. More importantly, it's forward-focused modeling builds prescriptive plans that specify the optimal investment by channel, by week. As a result our customers experience an average 25% lift in year one.

similar_products.short_desc: Predictive analytics platform with intuitive insight-driven dashboards for BI & analyst teams. Start using predictive analytics today!
similar_products.features: Pecan helps business intelligence, operations, and revenue teams predict mission-critical outcomes. As the world's only low-code predictive analytics and data science platform, Pecan enables companies to harness the full power of AI and predictive modeling without requiring any data scientists or data engineers.  With Pecan, companies can improve customer lifetime value, retention, conversion rates, demand forecasting, and other revenue-driving KPIs.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful easy to use SPC Software; Pareto, histogram, control charts, Gage R&R, process capability, distribution fitting, and more!
similar_products.features: SPC for Excel, a simple but powerful package, to handle all your SPC and statistical analysis needs.  From the novice to the black belt, SPC for Excel will facilitate your process improvement efforts - in any industry - profit or non-profit.  Get all the techniques you need for your charting and analysis - including Pareto diagrams, Histogram, Control Charts, Gage R&R, Process Capability, Distribution Fitting, Data Transformation, Regression, DOE, Hypothesis Testing, and more!

similar_products.features: Intuitive statistical software for the non statistician. Users conduct analyses using our wizard-like interface, and the output is an interpreted narrative with assumptions addressed and APA formatted tables and figures. Create print-ready, APA formatted quantitative results in minutes.

similar_products.short_desc: Power BI Connector for Jira allows you to export your Jira data to Power BI and build necessary dashboards with Jira data.
similar_products.features: Power BI Connector for Jira allows you to import easily and quickly any Jira data into Microsoft Power BI, including default fields and custom fields, History, Worklogs, Sprints, 3rd-party apps data, and others.

similar_products.short_desc: Platform that allows users to build compact AI models in just a few clicks. No coding required.
similar_products.features: Neuton, a cloud AutoML solution, makes Machine Learning available to everyone. Unlike traditional AI solutions that are very complex thus requiring rigorous tech skills and associated with high costs for implementation and support, Neuton doesn't require any coding and allows all demographics of users regardless of their experience to build AI solutions in just a few clicks. Neuton enables users to implement ML in days instead of months.

similar_products.short_desc: Tableau Connector for Jira enables you to stream all your data from Jira to Tableau.
similar_products.features:
Tableau Connector for Jira is anapplication that helps businesses extract and migrate data from JIRA to Tableau for further analysis. 

Tableau Connector for Jira app available for all Jira platforms - Server, Cloud, Data Center.

similar_products.short_desc: Plug-and-play visual analytics for exploring, preparing and labeling large data in much less time
similar_products.features:
Visplore is a graphical software for exploring large multivariate data, like time series from machines or sensors. Ready-to-use analysis tools save massive amounts of time for data preparation and support also non-programmers in making valuable discoveries. 

Highlights:
- Work with millions of data records without delay (zooming etc.).
- Select, cleanse, label and export data interactively 
- Connect with Python, R, Matlab, CSV, databases and OSISoft PI to get started in 1 minute.

similar_products.short_desc: A MATLAB toolbox for analyzing and modeling data using statistics and machine learning
similar_products.features: The MATLAB Statistics and Machine Learning Toolbox? provides functions and apps to describe, analyze, and model data. You can use descriptive statistics, visualizations, and clustering for exploratory data analysis; fit probability distributions to data; generate random numbers for Monte Carlo simulations, and perform hypothesis tests. Regression and classification algorithms let you draw inference

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Visualization software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Visualization tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Visualization software helps companies present information in an organized, graphical and easily searchable manner. This type of software is designed to integrate with existing applications and use data to build visual presentations. For related software solutions see Business Intelligence software, Knowledge Management software and Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Qualitative Data Analysis software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Qualitative Data Analysis tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Qualitative Data Analysis software is used by scientists and business researchers to discover and understand patterns, such as customer sentiment, in surveys and feedback submissions presented in a variety of text and media files.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reporting software applications allow real-time access to essential data as well as the rapid generation of multidimensional reports from diverse data sources. Among many other uses, Reporting software can generate financial statements, track the success of sales strategies, monitor responsiveness to regulatory compliance concerns and manage internal controls or security audits. Reporting software is related to Business Intelligence software and Survey software.

related_products.short_desc: From payments to credit to fraud protection, PayPal Commerce Platform helps you meet your customers where they are.
related_products.features: The better you know your customers, the smarter you can sell. That's good for both you and your customers. Now you can use shopper insights to optimize operations and improve marketing with customizable retargeting capabilities.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why Asana is a top performer on Capterra.
related_products.features: Asana helps teams orchestrate their work-from daily tasks to strategic cross-functional initiatives. With Asana, teams are more confident, move faster, and accomplish more with less-no matter where they are located. More than 119,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based human resources solution that helps businesses streamline workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes.
related_products.features: Workday HCM is a single, cloud-based solution for workforce planning, talent management, and payroll processes. The solution is used by Fortune 500 and G2k companies to operate with agility and efficiency, and for organizations to be ready for whatever comes next. Unlike rigid HR systems or point solutions, Workday HCM delivers a skills-based HCM foundation and continuously innovates to enable customer success as the impact of technology, alternative work arrangements, and employee expectations evolve.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online Advanced (Save 50%) is a cloud-based, all-in-one, accounting and business hub solution, designed for growing, small to mid-sized businesses. Get performance reporting with highly customizable tracking tools, automated workflows, and real-time revenue and cash flow management dashboards. Seamlessly integrate best-in-class Premium Apps like Salesforce and HubSpot (CRM), Bill.com (accounts payable), DocuSign, LeanLaw & more to expand your capabilities as your business needs grow.

related_products.short_desc:
Workforce Analytics for the Modern ?Workplace
Understand how your team works - from everywhere! Empower your people, hone healthy work
related_products.features: ActivTrak's workforce analytics provide predictive insights that help leaders, managers, and employees build trust, deepen engagement and boost productivity in the modern, hybrid workplace. This work is supported by the ActivTrak Productivity Lab, a global center for ground-breaking research and expertise that leverages data sourced from more than 9,000 customers and over 550,000 users.

related_products.short_desc: Sisense is a self-service analytics and reporting tool that lets anyone create interactive dashboards & reports in minutes.
related_products.features: Sisense democratizes end-user reports so that every end-user receives access to the data and valuable insights that govern their business. Use the reporting software with special features to customize BI report content, control distribution lists of the report, apply filters to relevant information in certain groups, and play with the format. The final output is a report that is destined to the right audience and targeted with the correct info that makes decision making data-driven

related_products.short_desc: Sage 100cloud is an ERP platform for growing and medium-sized distributors and manufacturers.
related_products.features: With more than 30 years as a market-leader, Sage 100cloud is among the most stable and feature-rich business management solutions for mid-sized manufacturers, distributors, and service businesses today. Built for security and compliance, Sage 100cloud is a trusted solution for managing complexities associated with growth. Thanks to its business objects framework, Web APIs, and Office 365 connectivity, Sage 100cloud can be easily customized to meet the unique needs of businesses.

similar_products.short_desc: Cube's reporting platform automatically syncs data from your tech stack to your spreadsheets so you can plan better and faster.
similar_products.features: Cube is the reporting software that automatically syncs source data from your tech stack to your spreadsheets. Optimize your reporting workflows in Excel and Google Sheets by reducing manual data transfers and the risk of human error. Finance professionals who use Cube can tell the story behind the numbers faster than ever. Cube pairs the flexibility and familiarity of your spreadsheet with the control and scale of performance software.

similar_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence tool that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data.
similar_products.features: A self-service business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights on your business information. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports in minutes with no IT help. Data can be imported from applications and databases, even behind firewalls. Zoho Analytics also includes Zoho DataPrep which connect, model, cleanse, transform, and enrich data for analytics.

similar_products.short_desc: Windward Core is the global leader in embedded document generation solutions, allowing users to create any kind of document imaginable.
similar_products.features: Windward Core is the global leader in document generation solutions. Core embeds into applications with only 11 lines of code. It enables users to design templates using business logic and multiple data sources within the familiar landscape of Microsoft Office. Core is fast, easy, and removes human error, transforming the way business professionals create documents. ISVs and OEMs can quickly take their custom solutions with powerful reporting capabilities to the market by integrating with Core.

Accommodates most payroll and ERP systems.

similar_products.short_desc: Dundas BI is a flexible, embeddable BI, reporting and data analytics platform. Everything you need is in one end-to-end tool.
similar_products.features: Dundas BI is a BI, data visualization and analytics platform for Software Vendors and enterprise organizations. Our fully customizable BI platform gives you instant access to real-time data and information from across your organization, so you can transform it into interactive dashboards and reports for faster insight into your entire business. Dundas BI  was designed to be embedded into your existing systems and applications for a great user experience. Free trial or live demo available.

similar_products.product_name: PBRS for Power BI (Power BI Reports Scheduler)
similar_products.short_desc: SSRS & Power BI Reports Scheduler: Send Data Driven SSRS & Power BI Dashboards & Reports To Unlimited Users
similar_products.features: PBRS saves time and money by making it easy to automate the distribution & delivery of SSRS & Power BI Reports & Dashboards. Simply define single or packages of Power BI reports, schedule, run them automatically, and send the reports to print, fax, folder, FTP, SMS, Dropbox, SharePoint & email in a number of standard formats including Excel, Word, PDF, HTML and more. Date & Time Scheduling, Event-Triggers, Dynamic & Data Driven Automation, Pre & Post Delivery Workflows.

similar_products.short_desc: Yellowfin is the only analytics suite that successfully combines action based dashboards with industry-leading automated analysis.
similar_products.features: Reports and dashboards that not only drive action, but allow you take action without ever leaving Yellowfin. Yellowfin reporting allows you to custom code actions right on the dashboard that call on APIs, design anything with a pixel perfect canvas, and query the data with AI with just a click. Bring your users & workflows to the dashboard for seamless data decision making.

similar_products.short_desc: Paladin's Powerfully Simple and Proven Point of Sale and Inventory Management software helps independent retail businesses run better.
similar_products.features:
Paladin Point of Sale and Inventory Management

For over 40 years, Paladin Data Corp. has been helping independent retail businesses run better. The hybrid retail system automates ordering, tracks inventory and provides detailed reports along with hundreds of integrations to enable the tools you need to succeed in managing your business more efficiently.

Learn more about Paladin's intuitive interface, easy set-up process, low monthly payments (no long-term contracts) and highly rated support.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use Financial, Operational and BI Reporting solution with focus on ERP Applications like Oracle Cloud ERP, EBS, NetSuite ..etc
similar_products.features: Easy to use Financial, Operational and BI Reporting solution that enables end users to develop their own analytics. Offering pre-built integration with several common ERP and Cloud applications such as Oracle Cloud ERP, Oracle E-Business Suite, PeopleSoft, Taleo, NetSuite and Salesforce. Orbit is a superior reporting platform for enterprise data from any application, any data source, and on any device.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Visualization software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Visualization tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Visualization software helps companies present information in an organized, graphical and easily searchable manner. This type of software is designed to integrate with existing applications and use data to build visual presentations. For related software solutions see Business Intelligence software, Knowledge Management software and Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Embedded Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Embedded Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Embedded Analytics software allows users to integrate analytical capabilities with the applications they already use and access analytical tools from within these applications.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Financial Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Financial Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Financial Reporting software automates the task of reporting an organization's financial results, status and transactions. Financial Reporting applications help organizations control and increase operational efficiencies. These solutions provide the ability to collect, translate and consolidate data from various systems and geographic locations. Financial Reporting software is related to Accounting software, Budgeting software, Business Performance Management software and Compliance software.
